long_description: The Kuhl Fuze(TM) Shorts present cutting-edge technological advances in matching an exoskeleton woven cloth frame with flexible alternate knit panels for exterior durability and interior comfort. Using a frame of woven fabric to create structure gives the Fuze the appearance, strength and performance of a traditional hiking short. Knit fabric panels at key points of contact and flex give the shorts the comfort of sweatpants. Gusseted knit crotch increases mobility. Standard 5-pocket design with an additional side pocket.
